Subject: Clients showing offline and expired
Description: Server version: 5.1.0.2 Our deployed system has several CentOS 7 clients (10 out of 18) reporting as "Offline" in the webpage. On one of the clients, we instructed the operator of our system to re-install the client software, but that has not made a difference. We noticed that the options.ini file includes the following line: expired=1 We have never seen this line in the configuration file before; the file is also missing options such as "ws_port", "ws_server", and "DepartmentCode" (among others). The licenses page within EPP does *not* show any license issues for Device Control or for the individual client licenses. The license still shows as attached to the client.
What_We_Know__c: 05Nov: Test build being tested at customer. Results to follow.
Next_Steps__c: 05Nov: Waiting on deployment vehicle to be identified before we close the Mgmt Escalation.
Solution_Comment__c: Closing ticket as resolved per last customer's update.
